food.name: Farm stand chicken chef’s salad
food.ingredients: tre 2 boneless skinless chicken thighs, poached and shredded 2 tablespoons homemade mayonnaise 1 teaspoon chopped fresh oregano 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt pinch of cracked black pepper 1 small garlic clove, minced 1 cup shredded mustard greens 1/2 cup shredded cabbage 1/2 cup julienned carrots 1/4 cup julienned Applegate Farm Provolone Cheese 1/4 cup julienned Applegate Farm Honey Ham 1 tablespoon olive oil 1 teaspoon apple cider vinegar 1/4 teaspoon organic sugar 1/8 teaspoon salt lemon wedges (optional)
food.description: Introducing the Farm Stand Chicken Chef's Salad – a vibrant and satisfying salad that combines the best of farm-fresh ingredients. With tender grilled chicken, crisp greens, colorful vegetables, creamy avocado, tangy feta cheese, and a zesty lemon herb dressing, this salad is a burst of flavors that will leave you craving more. Get ready to indulge in a healthy and delicious culinary experience!

food.name: Sweet potato and peanut curry

ingredients.ingredient_name: 3 tbsp Thai red curry paste (check the label to make sure it’s vegetarian/ vegan)
500g sweet potato, peeled and cut into chunks

food.description: I'm excited to share with you a delicious and aromatic recipe for Sweet Potato and Peanut Curry. This vibrant dish combines the natural sweetness of sweet potatoes with the nutty richness of peanuts, creating a truly delightful culinary experience. The creamy coconut milk adds a velvety texture, while the blend of aromatic spices elevates the flavors to new heights. Whether you're a fan of spicy dishes or simply looking to explore new tastes, this curry is bound to satisfy your cravings. So, let's dive into this mouthwatering recipe and get ready to indulge in a symphony of flavors!

food.name: Easy huevos rancheros

ingredients.ingredient_name: 1 tbsp vegetable oil or sunflower oil

food.description: An easy Mexican breakfast that'll keep you going all morning, this huevos rancheros recipe (aka 'ranch eggs') is packed with vibrant colours and flavours.
